mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into member (member_name, member_password, email, phoneNumber, default_address, `level`, active, balance) values (#{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultAddress,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{active,jdbcType=BIT}, #{balance, jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: update member set member_name = #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_password = #{memberPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, default_address = #{defaultAddress,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `level` = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, active = #{active,jdbcType=BIT}, balance = #{balance, jdbcType=DOUBLE} where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select member_id, member_name, member_password, email, phoneNumber, default_address, `level`, active, balance from member where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select member_id, member_name, member_password, email, phoneNumber, default_address, `level`, active, balance from member
